prompt:
Show me examples of all media types:

1. Text: Write a haiku about programming

2. Code: Show me a Python function to calculate fibonacci

3. Image: ![A beautiful landscape](https://picsum.photos/800/400)

4. Mermaid diagram:
```mermaid
graph TD
    A[User Request] --> B{Media Type}
    B -->|Text| C[Render Text]
    B -->|Image| D[Show Image]
    B -->|Video| E[Play Video]
    B -->|Code| F[Syntax Highlight]
```

5. Chart:
```chart
{
  "type": "bar",
  "data": {
    "labels": ["Images", "Videos", "Text", "Code", "Charts"],
    "datasets": [{
      "label": "Media Support",
      "data": [100, 90, 100, 100, 95],
      "backgroundColor": ["#FF6384", "#36A2EB", "#FFCE56", "#4BC0C0", "#9966FF"]
    }]
  }
}
```
